testsuite.test:
Verify Preconditions
Instructions: 1) You will requested some phone numbers to use for sending SMS, MMS, etc. 2) Click 'GO' to start.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

createMessage Create SMS and send it
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

sms messageId Verify that the generated message has an ID
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

createMessage Create MMS and send it
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

mms messageId Verify that the generated message has an ID
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

createMessage Create Email and send it
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

email messageId Verify that the generated message has an ID
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

createMessage Throws INVALID PARAMETER for missing param
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

createMessage Throws INVALID PARAMETER for invalid param
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findMessages Does callback fire
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findMessages Find message created and sent before
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getMessage Verify SMS with content test body 1300200975661
Instructions: Please verify that at least one SMS had been sent.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getMessage Verify EMail with subject test subject 1300200975660
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getMessage Verify MMS with subject test subject 1300200975660
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getMessage Throws INVALID PARAMETER for missing param
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getMessage Throws INVALID PARAMETER for invalid param
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

deleteMessage Delete MMS with subject test subject 1300200975660
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

deleteMessage Delete SMS with content test body 1300200975661
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

deleteMessage Delete EMail with subject test subject 1300200975660
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

deleteMessage Delete already deleted MMS again
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

deleteMessage Delete already deleted SMS again
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

deleteMessage Delete already deleted EMail again
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

sendMessage Send SMS to undefined
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Please verify that you received the SMS with the subject 'test subject 1300200975660'

sendMessage Throw INVALID PARAMETER missing parameter
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

sendMessage Throw UNKNOWN for SMS to 000000000000UNKNOWN
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

sendMessage Send MMS to undefined
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Please verify that you received the MMS with the subject 'test subject 1300200975660'

sendMessage Throw UNKNOWN for MMS to 000000000000UNKNOWN
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

sendMessage Send Email to undefined
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Please verify that you received the Email with the subject 'test subject 1300200975660'

sendMessage Throw UNKNOWN for Email to unknown vf commmmmm
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onMessageSendingFailure Test SMS to undefined
Instructions: 1) Minimize this application, to mini mode. 2) Turn off all network connections. 3) Maximize it again, to full screen mode. 4) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onMessageSendingFailure Test MMS to undefined
Instructions: 1) Minimize this application, to mini mode. 2) Turn off all network connections. 3) Maximize it again, to full screen mode. 4) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onMessageSendingFailure Test Email to undefined
Instructions: 1) Minimize this application, to mini mode. 2) Turn off all network connections. 3) Maximize it again, to full screen mode. 4) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onMessageArrived Test SMS to undefined
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onMessageArrived Test MMS to undefined
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

undefined
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
